lead_paragraph: If the owners of Revel Casino Hotel had their way, the $2.4 billion resort would have been shut down on Monday.

headline.main: Revel Wanted to Close Atlantic City Casino Monday
headline.print_headline: Revel Wanted to Close Atlantic City Casino Monday
